document_data.name: Summon Deva
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite document/Baldur's Gate II: Throne of Bhaal Game Manual|23}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Summon deva''''' was a powerful [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s, [[druid]]s and [[paladin]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell opened a gateway to the [[celestial planes]] and summoned a [[deva]]. The summoned deva fought for the caster against their enemies until they were killed or the spell expired.
